Package orbotix.view.calibration

CalibrationView for calibrating the 'forward' direction of the Sphero

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Controller A type that controls the Robot in real time.
 

Class Summary
CalibrationButtonView Deprecated. Please use CalibrationView
CalibrationCircle One of the three circles in the CalibrationView that rotate around the calibration point
CalibrationView A WidgetGraphicView that helps a user visualize calibration by showing some fancy graphic output when the user does a rotation gesture.
ColorTools Tools for working with integer color values
ControllerActivity An Activity that contains Controllers and can use them to control the Robot.
GlowingDot A WidgetGraphicPart that represents a glowing point of light
VectorAnimation A Vector animation that uses an interpolated mScale from 0 to 1 to aide with displaying animation progress
WidgetGraphicView A View that can have many WidgetParts added to it, and will draw them each invalidation cycle.
 

Enum Summary
CalibrationButtonView.CalibrationCircleLocation Used to define different draw locations of the calibration circle
CalibrationView.CalibrationCircleLocation Used to define different draw locations of the calibration circle
 

Package orbotix.view.calibration Description

CalibrationView for calibrating the 'forward' direction of the Sphero
